bibl.title: Ancient Perspectives on Egypt. (Encounters with Ancient Egypt.)
bibl.note: tabl., nombr. figg. n./bl. et 4 pll. coul.

12 contributions [some of them deriving from the proceedings of a conference entitled 'Encounters with Ancient Egypt', held at the Institute of Archaeology, University College London (UCL) in December 2000]. - Pp. 1-20, 1 tabl.: R.M. and C.R., Introduction: The Worlds of Ancient Egypt - Aspects, Sources, Interactions; - 243-253: Indexes.
bibl.seg: MATTHEWS Roger and Cornelia ROEMER (Edd.), Ancient Perspectives on Egypt. (Encounters with Ancient Egypt.)
London, Institute of Archaeology, University College, 2003, 8°, xvi-253 pp., tabl., nombr. figg. n./bl. et 4 pll. coul. ISBN 1-84472-002-0.

12 contributions [some of them deriving from the proceedings of a conference entitled 'Encounters with Ancient Egypt', held at the Institute of Archaeology, University College London (UCL) in December 2000]. - Pp. 1-20, 1 tabl.: R.M. and C.R., Introduction: The Worlds of Ancient Egypt - Aspects, Sources, Interactions; - 243-253: Indexes.
